mapper.select: SELECT * FROM contract WHERE business_num NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT business_num FROM workorder) order by business_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select c.business_num, c.item_num, r.item_name, c.contract_qty, r.r_name, round(r.r_qty/p.weight*c.contract_qty) as wo_qty from recipe r, contract c, products p where r.item_name=c.item_name and r.item_name=p.item_name and r.item_name=(select item_name from contract where business_num=#{num});

select w.wo_num, c.business_num, c.item_num, r.item_name, c.contract_qty, r.r_name, round(r.r_qty/p.weight*c.contract_qty) as wo_qty, w.manu_name from recipe r, contract c, products p, workorder w where r.item_name=c.item_name and r.item_name=p.item_name and c.business_num=w.business_num and r.item_name=(select item_name from contract where business_num=#{num});
mapper.insert: insert into workorder(wo_num, business_num, wo_date, wo_state, wo_qty, manu_name, item_name, wo_emp) values("1", #{business_num}, now(), default, #{contract_qty}, #{manu_name}, #{item_name}, #{wo_emp})

insert into workorder_item select w.wo_num, r.r_name as item_name, round(r.r_qty/p.weight*c.contract_qty) as wo_qty from recipe r, contract c, products p, workorder w where r.item_name=c.item_name and w.business_num=c.business_num and r.item_name=p.item_name and w.business_num=#{business_num}
mapper.update: update workorder set manu_name= #{manu_name} where wo_num= #{wo_num}
